Html:
Hello guys,

need an help to find where the net settings are. I have a proxy server and need to configure the setting to download from battlenet.

From the troubleshooting:

Are you using a Proxy (as many Corporate Environments do)?

  1. Did you enter the proxy info into Rawr (Tools > Options > Network Settings)

But clearly this is not true (at least for my Rawr version: Rauwr4 beta)

I can't find any network setting also under Options>Edit Options.

Thank you in advance. regards

You're right, that troubleshooting entry refers to the old Rawr 2. As far as I know the web version shouldn't need any special settings and should use whatever is set for the browser you are using. I don't think we've come to a conclusion yet how to address this in the wpf version.

Thank you for the advise.

I tried several time and magically at the 3rd time everything worked fine...

Thank you, bye
Both the WPF and Silverlight builds are designed to follow the Internet Explorer Settings. Do you have Internet Explorer set up with the proxy?

Yes I have . Now it worked almost every time yesterday but today nothing till now...

Here the error

The remote server returned an error: (500) Internal Server Error.

and the stack trace:

   at System.Net.HttpWebRequest.EndGetResponse(IAsyncResult asyncResult)
   at System.Net.WebClient.GetWebResponse(WebRequest request, IAsyncResult result)
   at System.Net.WebClient.DownloadBitsResponseCallback(IAsyncResult result)

 

Any suggestion?
